Articles.Content:
I have just downloaded Ship Manifest add-on. It seems simple enough except there is a problem with it so I thought i would make a comment on it in Kerbal SpacePort. To do that I need to log on, to do that I need to register, but when I attempt to register it doesn't let me because I have not specified an avatar file (even though this is not a compulsory field). I have asked support at KSP to no avail. Can someone help me with an avatar please? What sort of file is needed?

Many thanks

Edited January 21, 2014 by THobson
Have you looked on here under the mod area to see if there is a thread there? It's probably a better place to seek advice than from the space port.
Thanks. Yes I have now found Ship Manifest in the add ons. But for future reference does anyone have any help with registering at SpacePort?
Yes that is the page I have been using to Register. It doesn't let me Register without specifying an avatar file.

It's just a small image file. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Avatar_(computing)

I think it needs to be smaller than 200x200 pixels.

I think it needs to be smaller than 200x200 pixels.

Well, it could be larger, but it'll get cropped. In short, pick a random picture and use that.
Many thanks. I will give that a try.
